tool_description: Retrieve religious, non-public and public holidays for 200+ countries worldwide and for any specific year
name: Public Holidays
title: Public Holidays

api_list.name: Public Holiday Endpoint
api_list.description: The Public Holiday API allows you to gett the public, local, religious, and other holidays of a particular country.

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: he day to get the holiday(s) from, in the format of 1-31.

required_parameters.name: month
required_parameters.description: The month to get the holiday(s) from, in the format of 1-12 (e.g., 1 is January, 2 is February, etc).

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year to get the holiday(s) from.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country's two letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
